weight.title: Outline weight
weight.description: Thickness of the outline in pixels

restrictToLeafNodes.title: Restrict to leaf nodes
restrictToLeafNodes.description: Enable this option to allow selection only at the last level (leaf nodes) of the hierarchy tree. This ensures that users can only select the most specific items, preventing selection of intermediate categories

selectAllCheckboxEnabled.title: Show "Select all" option
selectAllCheckboxEnabled.description: Show "Select all" as an option in the slicer. This selects all the values in the slicer so you can unselect them one by one to create an "is not" type filter.

strictSingleSelect.title: Force selection
strictSingleSelect.description: Show slicer items with radio buttons

customFormatString.title: Format code
customFormatString.description: Enter a custom number format for your callout.

labelPrecision.title: Value decimal places
labelPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values
